descriptions.Utilization: When using Utilization, the target value is the average of the resource metric across all relevant pods, represented as a percentage of the requested value of the resource for the pods.
descriptions.AverageValue: When using AverageValue, the target value is the total across all relevant pods, represented as a raw value.

value.description: The target value to scale on.

containerName.description: Name of the specific container to scale based on its CPU, rather than the entire pod. Defaults to empty if not specified.
